name: Acheron's Gambit
description:
A dungeon crawler made for Ludum Dare 48! Find the blood crystals and bring them to the altar in each level. 

ESC to go fullscreen!

WASD to move

Left/Right click to attack

TAP to display map

Shift to jump

CTR to drop weapon (left, then right)

Walk over items with empty hands to pick up

NOTE: Shield blocks passively in a 45 degree cone! turn to absorb attacks coming from head on!

Core game loop by https://twitter.com/infamousmrmeow

Dungeon Generation by Justin Womack

Art by https://twitter.com/BeachBoogeyman

Music by https://twitter.com/submergedtapes
